title: Day 259
content:
# Day 259

Today has been a rough day. Had a dog walk go horribly wrong because the dog got off the leash while I was walking him. Spent around 4 hours looking for this dog to no avail. Only silver lining is I got over 25,000 steps in today but I feel horrible about the worst dog walking I've done in my entire career of dog walking. Praying the dog is found and returned safely to it's owner.

Also heard today from a great friend who might have cancer. That one was a gut punch to hear. I'm so proud of them for keeping their head up high and approaching it with a can-do attitude but man oh man. What a wild thing to happen at such a young age. Big wake up call for me to make sure I spend my days doing work I don't dread and focus on my health.

Day's like today are tough, life is full of good and bad times. Going to say a prayer the dog gets returned safely. Will also pray for my friend to be cancer free, they are a fighter so I'm confident they will pull through.

Don't have much else to write today. I can't change the past but I will keep my head high no matter the hardships. Tomorrow is going to be a better day.

12/6/22

Conor Jay Chepenik
